attributes.action: Scrap Fuel Tax and just have the ONE Road Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have to pay Fuel tax on our fuel when we already have to pay Road Tax, both of which comes from OUR taxed earnings? Why can there not be just ONE tax for cars, roads etc. Why should we have to pay tax 3 times!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
